accessrights.description: Type of access to the data source, as defined by re3data.org. Possible values: {open, restricted, closed}

certificates.description: The certificate, seal or standard the data source complies with. As defined by re3data.org.

citationguidelineurl.description: The URL of the data source providing information on how to cite its items. As defined by re3data.org.

contenttypes.description: Types of content in the data source, as defined by OpenDOAR

items.description: Types of content in the data source, as defined by OpenDOAR

databaseaccessrestriction.description: Access restrinctions to the data source, as defined by re3data.org. One of {feeRequired, registration, other}

scheme.description: The scheme used to express the value (i.e. pubsrepository::journal)

value.description: The value expressed in the scheme (Journal)

datasourcetype.description: The type of the datasource. See https://api.openaire.eu/vocabularies/dnet:datasource_typologies

datauploadrestriction.description: Upload restrictions applied by the datasource, as defined by re3data.org. One of {feeRequired, registration, other}

dateofvalidation.description: The date of last validation against the OpenAIRE guidelines for the datasource records

englishname.description: The English name of the datasource

id.description: The OpenAIRE id of the data source

edition.description: Edition of the journal or conference proceeding

name.description: Name of the journal or conference

journal.description: Information about the journal, if this data source is of type Journal.

languages.description: The languages present in the data source's content, as defined by OpenDOAR.

items.description: The languages present in the data source's content, as defined by OpenDOAR.

missionstatementurl.description: The URL of a mission statement describing the designated community of the data source. As defined by re3data.org

officialname.description: The official name of the datasource

openairecompatibility.description: OpenAIRE guidelines the data source comply with. See also https://guidelines.openaire.eu.

scheme.description: The scheme used to express the value

value.description: The value expressed in the scheme

pidsystems.description: The persistent identifier system that is used by the data source. As defined by re3data.org

policies.description: Policies of the data source, as defined in OpenDOAR.

items.description: Policies of the data source, as defined in OpenDOAR.

releaseenddate.description: Date when the data source went offline or stopped ingesting new research data. As defined by re3data.org

releasestartdate.description: Releasing date of the data source, as defined by re3data.org

subjects.description: List of subjects associated to the datasource

items.description: List of subjects associated to the datasource

uploadrights.description: Type of data upload. As defined by re3data.org: one of {open, restricted,closed}

versioning.description: As defined by redata.org: 'yes' if the data source supports versioning, 'no' otherwise.
